|brand = Broadcom |model = BCM943602 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = CDP |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 09/18/2015 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Broadcom_BCM943602CDP |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AC1750 |series = BCM943602 |if = PCIe |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = (non-standard connector) |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = 14e4 |device_id = 43ba |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = QDS-BRCM1089 |icid = 4234A-BRCM1089 |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43602; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = MHF4 |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 3 |rxchains = 3 |sstreams = 3 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 1300 |802.11n = 450/450 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|availability = reference design |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/30/2015 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->

{{FCC ST|11/04/2015}}
===Specificacions=== [[Broadcom BCM943602CDP]] 802.11a/b/g/n/ac + BT 4.1, 3x3, 2.4/5GHz
Based on ''Broadcom'''s naming scheme, this device is assumed to be using BCM43602. :[http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s817141 ''Broadcom'' News Release for BCM43602] :[[Broadcom]] BCM43602 Vendor ID: 0x14e4, DeviceID: 0x43ba *BCM43602 14e4:43ba supported in 3.17+ [http://wireless.kernel.org/en/users/Drivers/brcm80211] *BCM43602 14e4:43bb 2.4GHz device, supported in 3.19+ *BCM43602 14e4:43bc 5GHz device, supported in 3.19+ :Broadcom BCM20703 (chipset support BT 4.1)
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[https://applelife.ru/threads/wi-fi-bluetooth-airdrop-handoff-i-instant-hotspot-v-os-x-10-10.42443/page-12#post-493447 On '''AppleLife''' forums] *[[User:Skvo|''Skvo'']] [http://www.tonymacx86.com/general-hardware-discussion/99327-could-next-wlan-bluetooth-combo-card-2013-macbooks.html notes the pinout of the proprietary connector used on the '''Tonymacx86''' forums] *[http://www.insanelymac.com/forum/user/332888-skvo/ On '''InsanelyMac''']
[[Category:English Documentation]]
